attributes.action: Stop UK ISP's from blocking access to The Pirate Bay
attributes.additional_details:
Today the UK Government made the decision to force UK ISP's to block access to The Pirate Bay website.

With torrents now being a widely used sharing platform for application developers and music producers, it is a ridiculous idea for the government to block access to this website through believing it solely consists of illegal pirated material.

Sign this petition to help stop the block!
